Independence from Obscurity

‚ÄúThe right of the people to be secure in their persons, houses, papers, and effects, against unreasonable searches and seizures, shall not be violated, and no Warrants shall issue, but upon probable cause, supported by Oath or affirmation, and particularly describing the place to be searched, and the persons or things to be seized.‚Äù

Rule by Obscurity

Our freedoms are dying a death by a thousand cuts. Imagine a not too distant future, that to the more paranoid minded may be a past instead. Your alarm wakes you early on Saturday morning because your office's productivity AI decides they need the extra help. It chose you because based on sentiment analysis of your actions and communications this week, you are the most likely of your co-workers to be agreeable and productive. On your way to work, your phone routes you through a detour to avoid congesting a street that is going to be used by a VIP later. At the end of the day, you recieve a notification with your extra pay today. It is exactly the amount of underpay you will settle for based on previous interactions. Each day, millions of Americans' data is stolen, and they don't even know it.

Note: Confidence for the fingerprint will be capped at 0.7, because the "Pro" version of FingerprintJS isn't being used.
const fpPromise = import("https://openfpcdn.io/fingerprintjs/v3") .then((FingerprintJS) => FingerprintJS.load());
Failed to load fingerprint, try disabling your adblocker and refreshing.

Weaponized Data Collection

Data collection has been used as a weapon long before the internet, but has grown to a much larger scale because of it. It now exists on such a scale that an unknown number of entities know things about you that you may not know yourself. For example, by correlating data sets like location data with time data like office hours, you can build a profile on people's habits and responses to stimuli.

Divided and Conquered

Much of our society's culture is now online. One of the most beautiful things about the internet is that no matter who or where you are, you can find a group of similar and like-minded people. This is also a major weakness, because it enables hyper targeting.
